channel.title: 614 npc combat yess but not following :(!
channel.description:
My 614 server has npc combat but the thing is that all ways when i attack an npc and walk some where freeze me and i have to log out and log in again :( So when i walk freeze me and it say this
Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10 at dragonkk.rs2rsps.model.Walking.getNextEntityMovement(Walking.java:189 ) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.update.GameLogic.run(GameLogic.java:28) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
